mapper.sql: SELECT P.PARTYID partyID, P.CHANGETYPE changeType, P.EFFECTIVETYPE effectiveType, P.PARTYTYPE partyType, P.PARTYNAME partyName, P.PARTYALIAS partyAlias, P.PARTYSTATUS partyStatus, P.CONTACT contact, P.TELEPHONE telephone, P.MAIL mail, P.FAX fax, P.EFFECTDATE effectDate, P.INEFFECTIVEDATE inEffectiveDate, P.CHANGENUMBER changeNumber, P.CHANGECIRCLETIMES changeCircleTimes, P.LASTUPDATE lastUpDate, P.LASTUPTIME lastUpTime FROM ecny_comm_party_tobeffect P

insert.if: INSERT INTO ecny_comm_party_tobeffect( PARTYID, CHANGETYPE, EFFECTIVETYPE, PARTYTYPE, PARTYNAME, PARTYALIAS, PARTYSTATUS, CONTACT, TELEPHONE, MAIL, FAX, EFFECTDATE, INEFFECTIVEDATE, CHANGENUMBER, CHANGECIRCLETIMES, LASTUPDATE, LASTUPTIME ) VALUE ( #{partyID}, #{changeType}, #{effectiveType}, #{partyType}, #{partyName}, #{partyAlias}, #{partyStatus}, #{contact}, #{telephone}, #{mail}, #{fax}, #{effectDate}, #{inEffectiveDate}, #{changeNumber}, #{changeCircleTimes}, #{lastUpDate}, #{lastUpTime} )

mapper.update: UPDATE ecny_comm_party_tobeffect SET CHANGETYPE = #{partyType}, CHANGETYPE = #{changeType}, EFFECTIVETYPE = #{effectiveType}, PARTYTYPE = #{partyType}, PARTYNAME = #{partyName}, PARTYALIAS = #{partyAlias}, PARTYSTATUS = #{partyStatus}, CONTACT = #{contact}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone}, MAIL = #{mail}, FAX = #{fax}, EFFECTDATE = #{effectDate}, INEFFECTIVEDATE = #{inEffectiveDate}, CHANGENUMBER = #{changeNumber}, CHANGECIRCLETIMES = #{changeCircleTimes}, LASTUPDATE = #{lastUpDate}, LASTUPTIME = #{lastUpTime} WHERE PARTYID = #{partyID}
